  • Package SimulationFramework

    • Class SimulationFramework.AnimatePanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      42L

      • Serialized Fields

        • appFrame

          SimFrame appFrame
          reference to simulation's main class

        • canvas

          javax.swing.JLabel canvas
          drawing area

        • slider

          javax.swing.JSlider slider
          control the speed of the simulation's animation

        • box

          javax.swing.Box box
          hold the "state control" buttons

        • start

          javax.swing.JButton start
          start the simulation running with current model

        • stop

          javax.swing.JButton stop
          stop the simulation running with current model

        • clear

          javax.swing.JButton clear
          clear the temporary markers and connectors from the current model, set all bots to their initial model state. "Start" will re-run the current simulation model.

        • reset

          javax.swing.JButton reset
          remove all bots, markers, and connectors from the model, enable "Start" to setup a new simulation model

        • bot

          java.util.ArrayList<E> bot
          hold all the bots

        • temporaryDrawables

          java.util.ArrayList<E> temporaryDrawables
          hold all temporary Connectors and Markers

        • permanentDrawables

          java.util.ArrayList<E> permanentDrawables
          hold all permanent Connectors and Markers

        • delayInitial

          int delayInitial
          default animation speed 1 fps

        • delayMin

          int delayMin
          fastest animation speed 25 fps

        • delayMax

          int delayMax
          slowest animation speed 1 frame every 5 seconds

        • delayStep

          int delayStep
          increment "ticks" between slider values

        • delayInterval

          int delayInterval
          current milliseconds to "sleep" between animation frames

    • Class SimulationFramework.SimFrame extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      42L

      • Serialized Fields

        • xDim

          int xDim
          horizontal extent of the simulation space

        • yDim

          int yDim
          vertical extent of the simulation space

        • menuBar

          javax.swing.JMenuBar menuBar

        • aboutMenu

          javax.swing.JMenu aboutMenu

        • usageItem

          javax.swing.JMenuItem usageItem
          describes how to run / use the program

        • authorItem

          javax.swing.JMenuItem authorItem
          information about the model's (program's) designer/developer

        • status

          javax.swing.JLabel status
          information displayed at the bottom of the frame

        • animatePanel

          AnimatePanel animatePanel
          GUI container for animation of model

        • simRunning

          boolean simRunning
          true if simulation is running, paused model can start back up

        • simValid

          boolean simValid
          true if model has been setup -- simulation can be "re-run"

        • waitingForMouseClick

          boolean waitingForMouseClick
          true iff mousePosition() has been called, waiting for mouse click"

        • mousePosition

          java.awt.Point mousePosition
          where the user clicked the mouse in AnimatePanel.canvas

        • startTime

          long startTime
          Used to time algorithm performance at millisecond level
          see getAlgoTime()

        • totalTime

          long totalTime
          Used to time algorithm performance at millisecond level
          see getAlgoTime()
